channel.title: .... Quest list troubles

item.title: .... Quest list troubles
item.dc:creator: @green2 ...green...
item.description:
@green2 wrote:

you dude q11 = 15…
thats the end of quest 11… you cant just start another quest by doing if q12 = 0 lol

public void q11help() { sendQuest("The Wolf's Cure", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q11 == 0){ sendQuest("I can start this quest by talking to Merlin.", 8147); sendQuest("He is located at Seer's Village near the bank.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q11 == 1){ sendQuest("Merlin has asked me to find him the following ingredients:", 8147); sendQuest("1 Spider egg, 1 ash, and 1 bag of salt.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q11 == 15){ sendQuest("I have completed the quest!", 8147); sendQuest("I can now buy Black and Dragon gloves from Giles.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); }

TO START A NEW QUEST,

public void q12help() { sendQuest("The Wolf's Cure", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); if(q12 == 0){ sendQuest("I can start this quest by talking to Merlin.", 8147); sendQuest("He is located at Seer's Village near the bank.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q12 == 1){ sendQuest("Merlin has asked me to find him the following ingredients:", 8147); sendQuest("1 Spider egg, 1 ash, and 1 bag of salt.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } if(q12 == 15){ sendQuest("I have completed the quest!", 8147); sendQuest("I can now buy Black and Dragon gloves from Giles.", 8148); sendQuest("", 8149); sendQuest("", 8150); } sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); flushOutStream(); } USE THAT, BUT CHANGE THE WORDS =] np

item.title: .... Quest list troubles
item.dc:creator: @_ExiledScape `ExiledScape
item.description:
@_ExiledScape wrote:

After the 11th line on my quest list nothing will show up…

Example;

if(c.q11 == 15){ c.sendQuest("EXAMPLE", 7342); \\ This shows on the quest list. } if(c.q12 == 0){ c.sendQuest("EXAMPLE", 7343); \\ This doesn't. No text in the quest list where it should be.

Anyone got an explanation for this?

Read full topic
